org.codehaus.preon.el
Class OuterResolvingReference

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.preon.el.OuterResolvingReference
All Implemented Interfaces:
Descriptive, Reference<Resolver>, ReferenceContext<Resolver>
public class OuterResolvingReference
extends Object
implements Reference<Resolver>

A Reference to support references to objects referenced from outer references. Whenever a new reference is constructed from a OuterReference, then that new reference needs to preserve some properties:

  • getReferenceContext() will need to return a reference to the original ResolverContext;
  • resolve(Resolver) will first need to Resolve the "outer" resolver, using the outerName;
  • ... and these properties need to be preserved for all next references constructed from this reference.

Author:
Wilfred Springer (wis)
